name: Big Batch Eggnog Bars with Rum Ganache

ingredients.name: Eggnog Cheesecake Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or cheesecake mix of your choice

preparation: Prepare cheesecake mix for filling as per package instructions.
Place Perfect Petites on Sheet Pan. Using a basting brush, lightly brush with oil.
Prepare crust by combining gingersnap crumbs with butter. Place 1 tsp of crust mixture into each Perfect Petites section, press lightly.
Using a piping bag or a ziplock bag with the corner cut off, top with cheesecake filling.
Bake for 20–25 minutes. Cool completely before flipping Perfect Petites onto Sheet Pan and twisting to pop out cheesecake bars.
Repeat steps 4 through 6 for a second batch.
Place chocolate chips and cream in a microwaveable dish.
Microwave for 45 seconds and stir until chocolate is melted and smooth.
tips: Freeze half your batch of cheesecake bars so you can use them all the way through the holiday season.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: No more cutting. No more waste. Use this cookware item to create 30 individual, perfect portions—both sweet & savoury.
